con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://uthao.com/ride/definitions" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:schema="http://uthao.com/ride/schemas" xmlns:tns="http://uthao.com/ride/definitions"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="ride.xsd" schemaLocation="ride.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="RideRequest"> <wsdl:part element="schema:RideRequest" name="RideRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="RideSharing"> <wsdl:operation name="Ride"> <wsdl:input message="tns:RideRequest" name="RideRequest"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="RideSharingBinding" type="tns:RideSharing"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="Ride"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://uthao.com/ride/RequestRide"/> <wsdl:input name="RideRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="RideSharingService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:RideSharingBinding" name="RideSharingPort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/RideSharingService/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://uthao.com/ride/schemas" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:hr="http://uthao.com/ride/schemas"> <xs:element name="RideRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:all> <xs:element name="Route" type="hr:RouteType"/> <xs:element name="User" type="hr:UserType"/> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="RouteType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Source" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Destination" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="UserType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="UserUID" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sch="http://uthao.com/ride/schemas"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <sch:RideRequest> <!--You may enter the following 2 items in any order--> <sch:Route> <sch:Source>Bismillah Sociery, Bakshi Bajar</sch:Source> <sch:Destination>IIT, University of Dhaka</sch:Destination> </sch:Route> <sch:User> <sch:UserUID>12bh891g17g9</sch:UserUID> </sch:User> </sch:RideRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/definitions" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" schemaLocation="../schemas/customer.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" schemaLocation="../schemas/payment-header.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" element="schema:CustomerIdentifier" name="CustomerIdentifier"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CustomerIdentifierDetail"> <wsdl:part element="schema:CustomerIdentifier" name="CustomerIdentifier"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CustomerIdentifierPayment"> <wsdl:part element="schema:CustomerIdentifier" name="CustomerIdentifier"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="PaymentHeader"> <wsdl:part element="schema:PaymentHeader" name="PaymentHeader"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CustomerPaymentMedium"> <wsdl:part element="schema:CustomerIdentifier" name="CustomerIdentifier"/> <wsdl:part element="schema:PaymentHeader" name="PaymentHeader"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="AcknowledgementCodeResponse"> <wsdl:part element="schema:AcknowledgementCodeResponse" name="AcknowledgementCodeResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="CustomerResource"> <wsdl:operation name="RegisterCustomer"> <wsdl:input message="tns:CustomerRequest" name="CustomerRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:AcknowledgementCodeResponse" name="AcknowledgementCodeResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="UpdateProfile"> <wsdl:input message="tns:CustomerDocument" name="CustomerDocument"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:AcknowledgementCodeResponse" name="AcknowledgementCodeResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="BanCustomer"> <wsdl:input message="tns:CustomerIdentifier" name="CustomerIdentifier"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:AcknowledgementCodeResponse" name="AcknowledgementCodeResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetDetails"> <wsdl:input message="tns:CustomerIdentifierDetail" name="CustomerIdentifierDetail"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:CustomerDocument" name="CustomerDocument"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetPaymentMedium"> <wsdl:input message="tns:CustomerIdentifierPayment" name="CustomerIdentifierPayment"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:PaymentHeader" name="PaymentHeader"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="StorePaymentInfo"> <wsdl:input message="tns:CustomerPaymentMedium" name="CustomerPaymentMedium"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:AcknowledgementCodeResponse" name="AcknowledgementCodeResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="CustomerResourceBinding" type="tns:CustomerResource"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="RegisterCustomer"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://mycompany.com/RegisterCustomer"/> <wsdl:input name="CustomerRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="AcknowledgementCodeResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="UpdateProfile"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://mycompany.com/UpdateProfile"/> <wsdl:input name="CustomerDocument"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="AcknowledgementCodeResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="BanCustomer"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://mycompany.com/BanCustomer"/> name="CustomerDocument"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetPaymentMedium"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://mycompany.com/GetPaymentMedium"/> <wsdl:input name="CustomerIdentifierPayment"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="PaymentHeader"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="StorePaymentInfo"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://mycompany.com/StorePaymentInfo"/> <wsdl:input name="CustomerPaymentMedium"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="AcknowledgementCodeResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="CustomerResourceService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:CustomerResourceBinding" name="CustomerResourcePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/ws/customer"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen"> <xs:element name="CustomerRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="mobile" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="address" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CustomerDocument"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="customer" type="tns:Customer"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CustomerIdentifier"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="Customer"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="mobile" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="address" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen"> <xs:element name="AcknowledgementCodeResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="acknowledgementcode" type="tns:AcknowledgementCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="AcknowledgementCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OK"/> <xs:enumeration value="CREATED"/> <xs:enumeration value="UPDATED"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELETED"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAILED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

type="schema:TripIdentifier"/> <xsd:element name="Payment" type="schema:Payment"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen"> <xs:element name="AcknowledgementCodeResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="acknowledgementcode" type="tns:AcknowledgementCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="AcknowledgementCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OK"/> <xs:enumeration value="CREATED"/> <xs:enumeration value="UPDATED"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELETED"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAILED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen"> <xs:element name="TripHeaderDocument"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="tripHeader" type="tns:TripHeader"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="TripIdentifier"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TripHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TripIdentifier" type="tns:TripIdentifier"/> <!--<xs:element name="customer" type="xs:string"/>--> <!--<xs:element name="driver" type="xs:string"/>--> <xs:element name="status" type="tns:Status"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="Status"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="REQUESTED"/> <xs:enumeration value="ACTIVE"/> <xs:enumeration value="END"/> <xs:enumeration value="FINISHED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen"> <xs:include schemaLocation="trip-header.xsd"/> <xs:include schemaLocation="route-header.xsd"/> <xs:include schemaLocation="feedback.xsd"/> <xs:element name="TripDocument"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="trip" type="tns:Trip"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="Trip"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="header" type="tns:TripHeader"/> <xs:element name="RouteHeader" type="tns:RouteHeader"/> <xs:element name="fare" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="estTime" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="medium" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="feedback" type="tns:Feedback"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen"> <xs:include schemaLocation="place-header.xsd"/> <xs:element name="RouteHeaderDocument"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RouteHeader" type="tns:RouteHeader"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="RouteHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="source" type="tns:PlaceHeader"/> <xs:element name="destination" type="tns:PlaceHeader"/> <xs:element name="distance" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen"> <xs:element name="PlaceHeaderDocument"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="PlaceHeader" type="tns:PlaceHeader"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="PlaceIdentifier"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="latitude" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="longitude" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PlaceHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="tns:PlaceIdentifier"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen"> <xs:element name="FeedbackDocument"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="feedback" type="tns:Feedback"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="Feedback"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="rating" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="review" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen"> <xs:element name="CustomerDocument"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="customer" type="tns:Customer"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CustomerIdentifierDocument"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="tns:CustomerIdentifier"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="CustomerIdentifier"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Customer"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CustomerIdentifier" type="tns:CustomerIdentifier"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="mobile" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="address" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen"> <xs:element name="PaymentHeaderDocument"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="PaymentHeader" type="tns:PaymentHeader"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="PaymentIdentifier"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="tns:PaymentIdentifier"/> <xs:element name="medium" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="account_number" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="amount" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen"> <xs:include schemaLocation="payment-header.xsd"/> <xs:element name="PaymentDocument"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Payment" type="tns:Payment"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="Payment"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="header" type="tns:PaymentHeader"/> <xs:element name="status" type="tns:PaymentStatus"/> <xs:element name="model" type="tns:PaymentReferer"/> <xs:element name="trx_id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="store_id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentReferer"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="model_type" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="model_id" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="PaymentStatus"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="INIT"/> <xs:enumeration value="PROCESSING"/> <xs:enumeration value="SUCCESS"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAILED"/> <xs:enumeration value="CANCELED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.com/rideshare/gen"> <xs:include schemaLocation="customer.xsd"/> <xs:include schemaLocation="trip-header.xsd"/> <xs:include schemaLocation="payment-header.xsd"/> <xs:element name="RideSharingTripDocument"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RideSharingTrip" type="tns:RideSharingTrip"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="RideSharingTrip"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TripIdentifier" type="tns:TripIdentifier"/> <xs:element name="RideMode" type="tns:RideMode"/> <xs:element name="CustomerIdentifier" type="tns:CustomerIdentifier"/> <xs:element name="driver" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="PaymentIdentifier" type="tns:PaymentIdentifier"/> <!--driver identifier will be mapped, not done since driver service not done--> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RideMode"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="medium" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="fare" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

con:request.name: Ride - Request 1
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sch="http://uthao.com/ride/schemas"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <sch:RideRequest> <!--You may enter the following 2 items in any order--> <sch:Route> <sch:Source>Bismillah Sociery, Bakshi Bajar</sch:Source> <sch:Destination>IIT, University of Dhaka</sch:Destination> </sch:Route> <sch:User> <sch:UserUID>12bh891g17g9</sch:UserUID> </sch:User> </sch:RideRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
